resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103249</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Logarithms - Grade 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Logarithmen - Grad 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Logarithmes - Catégorie 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Logarítmos - Classe 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Logaritmi - Grado 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογάριθμοι - βαθμός 12</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Logaritmos - Grado 12</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Grade 12: Logarithms. Demonstrate an understanding of the definition of a logarithm and any laws needed to solve real-life problems (e.g. growth and decay).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Africa</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grad 12: Logarithmen. Demonstrieren 
Sie ein Verständnis der Definition eines Logarithmus und aller 
möglicher Gesetze, die benötigt werden, um real-life Probleme zu 
lösen (z.B. Wachstum und Zerfall).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Catégorie 12 : Logarithmes. 
Démontrez un arrangement de la définition d'un logarithme et 
de toutes les lois requis pour résoudre des problèmes réels (par 
exemple croissance et affaiblissement).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classe 12: Logarítmos. Demonstre uma 
compreensão da definição de um logarítmo e de todas as leis 
necessitados resolver problemas real-life (por exemplo crescimento e 
deterioração).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grado 12: Logaritmi. Dimostri una 
comprensione della definizione di un logaritmo e di tutte le leggi 
stati necessario per risolvere i problemi in vivo (per esempio 
sviluppo e deperimento).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαθμός 12: Λογάριθμοι. Καταδείξτε μια 
κατανόηση του καθορισμού ενός λογαρίθμου και οποιωνδήποτε νόμων 
που απαιτούνται για να λύσουν τα πραγματικά προβλήματα (π.χ. 
αύξηση και αποσύνθεση).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Grado 12: Logaritmos. Demuestre una 
comprensión de la definición de un logaritmo y de cualquier ley 
necesitados para solucionar problemas de la vida real (e.g. 
crecimiento y decaimiento).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103249</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/logarithms</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
